QuestData.Title: The Lost Brother
QuestData.Description: Me brother Bahrum has gone missing!$b$bHe was one of the first scouts in the area. All the others have returned safely, but there be no sign of him. Da says he's just dawdlin' somewhere, but he's me only brother, and I promised me mum that I would keep him safe. Will you please find him?
QuestData.RewardText: Don't be looking! I'm not wearin' me pants!
